009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
014import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
015import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.SingularValueDecomposition;
016
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.PntUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
020
021/**
022 * Taubin's algebraic circle fitting method (SVD version)
023 *
024 */
025public class CircleFitTaubin extends CircleFitAlgebraic {
026        
027        private final double[] q;       // p = (A,B,C,D) circle parameters
028        
029        public CircleFitTaubin(Pnt2d[] points) {
030                this.q = fit(points);
031        }
032        
033        private double[] fit(Pnt2d[] points) {
034                int nPoints = points.length;
035                if (nPoints < 3)
036                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("at least 3 points are required");
037
038                Pnt2d centroid = PntUtils.centroid(points);
039                double xr = centroid.getX();
040                double yr = centroid.getY();
041
042                double[][] Xa = new double[nPoints][3]; // Xa[i] = (z, x, y)
043                double zSum = 0;
044                for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; i++) {
045                        double x = points[i].getX() - xr;
046                        double y = points[i].getY() - yr;
047                        double z = sqr(x) + sqr(y);
048                        zSum = zSum + z;
049                        Xa[i][0] = z;
050                        Xa[i][1] = x;
051                        Xa[i][2] = y;
052                }
053                
054                double zMean = zSum / nPoints;
055                double zMeanSqrt = Math.sqrt(zMean);
056                
057                // normalize z to zero mean, unit variance:
058                for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; i++) {
059                        Xa[i][0] = (Xa[i][0] - zMean) / (2 * zMeanSqrt);
060                }
061                
062                RealMatrix X = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(Xa);
063                SingularValueDecomposition svd = new SingularValueDecomposition(X);
064                RealMatrix V = svd.getV();
065                
066                // get the column vector of V associated with the smallest singular value:
067                double[] svals = svd.getSingularValues();
068                int minIdx = Matrix.idxMin(svals);
069                double[] a = V.getColumn(minIdx);
070
071                double[] qq = new double[4];
072                qq[0] =  a[0] / (2 * zMeanSqrt);
073                qq[1] =  a[1];
074                qq[2] =  a[2];
075                qq[3] = -a[0] * zMeanSqrt / 2;
076                                
077                // re-adjust for data centering: -----------------------
078                double[][] M = 
079                        {{ 1, 0, 0, 0 },
080                         {-2*xr, 1, 0, 0 },
081                         {-2*yr, 0, 1, 0 },
082                         {sqr(xr) + sqr(yr), -xr, -yr, 1}};
083                RealMatrix MM = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(M);
084                
085                double[] q = MM.operate(qq);
086                return q;
087        }
088        
089        @Override
090        public double[] getParameters() {
091                return this.q;
092        }
093

095
